import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import AWS from'../aws-config';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Education=()=>{const[education,setEducation]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{const dynamoDb=new AWS.DynamoDB.DocumentClient();const params={TableName:'Education',Key:{School:'New Jersey Institute of Technology'}};try{const data=await dynamoDb.get(params).promise();console.log('Fetched education data:',data.Item);// Debugging
if(data.Item){setEducation(data.Item);}else{console.error('No education data found.');}}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching education data:',error);}};fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"education-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Education"}),education?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:education.School}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[education.Major," Major with a Concentration in ",education.Concentration,", and a ",education.Minor," Minor"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:education.Dates}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"degree-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:education.Degree,alt:"Degree"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"highlights",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:education.Highlights})})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No education data found."})]});};export default Education;
